comments.en:
Probably japanese equivalent of the Epson Stylus Photo 900.

6-color CMYKcm printing, roll paper feeder, Tray for direct printing on CDs, USB and parallel port.

The printer is compatible to the Epson Stylus Photo 915, so choose this model (using the Gimp-Print driver) as long as the Epson PM 740C is not explicitly supported by Gimp-Print.
